name: ax-pre-lttri
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, cltrr, c1), wn(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c1, cltrr, c0)))))
comment: Ordering on reals satisfies strict trichotomy. Axiom 18 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-lttri . Note: The more general version for extended reals is ~ axlttri . Normally new proofs would use ~ xrlttri . (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
